data.name: Speed
data.detailed_description: Speed is a fast paced action game requiring the player to constantly think on their feet. Only two buttons guide you on this journey A click on the right/left (Mouse And Keyboard Controls) or two buttons on your favorite controller. A right sided button click with apply angular force to the square you are controlling pushing in to the right and vice versa for the left sided button. Sounds simple right? well yes but actually no. With this little control it can be EXTREMELY hard to avoid all obstacles and reach the end of each level unharmed. Every level is sure to require hundreds of rage filled attempts as your skill level increases. Mastery of controls will make you feel as if you have achieved greatness so what do you say will you play Speed or is it just too hard for you?
data.about_the_game: Speed is a fast paced action game requiring the player to constantly think on their feet. Only two buttons guide you on this journey A click on the right/left (Mouse And Keyboard Controls) or two buttons on your favorite controller. A right sided button click with apply angular force to the square you are controlling pushing in to the right and vice versa for the left sided button. Sounds simple right? well yes but actually no. With this little control it can be EXTREMELY hard to avoid all obstacles and reach the end of each level unharmed. Every level is sure to require hundreds of rage filled attempts as your skill level increases. Mastery of controls will make you feel as if you have achieved greatness so what do you say will you play Speed or is it just too hard for you?
data.short_description: Speed is a fast paced action game requiring the player to constantly think on their feet. With only the guide of two buttons you must summon all skill to outrun the wall of fire and beat the level and move on to the next.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 2000, XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 1 GHZ
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c and Shader Model 3.0 support (almost all graphics cards)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7
  • Processor: 1 GHZ
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 64 MB 3D video card with OpenGL support
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 32-Bit Linux distribution recommended
  • Processor: 1 GHZ
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 64 MB 3D video card with OpenGL support
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
